securepoll-archive-private: Yi hakuri, shugabannin zabene kawai zasu iya ajiye/rashin ajiye zabuka
securepoll-archive-not-finished: Yi hakuri, zaben da aka gama ne kawai zaka iya ajiyewa.
securepoll-archive-in-progress: Zaben a halin yanzu an ajiyeshi
securepoll-archive-error: Ya kasa ajiye wannan zaben. Sake gwadawa
securepoll-already-archived-error: Wannan zaben an riga an ajiye shi.
securepoll-unarchive-in-progress: Zabe ayanzu ba'a cimma shi ba.
securepoll-already-unarchived-error: Wannan zaben ba'a ajiye shi ba
securepoll-log-action-type-2: $1, $2 sun kalli jerin masu jefa ƙuri'a na zaɓe $3.
securepoll-log-action-type-3: $1, $2 sun kalli bayanan masu jefa kuri'a na zaben $3.
securepoll-stv-excluded-candidates-help-: An cire (s) masu zuwa da hannu daga lissafin.
